attributes.action: Stop giving children as young as six or over to be taught self- touching lessons
attributes.background: To stop teaching our children as young as six or over to be taught self-touching,  it's wrong on so many levels and needs to stop now! Sign this petition to protect our kids

rejection.details:
You can find out more about what the Government is proposing around Relationships and Sex Education here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/social-policy/education/relationships-and-sex-education-in-schools-whats-changing/

You could start new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
